Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: It's that time of year as Sports Professor Rick Horrow counts down the top dealmaking, sports tech and philanthropic sports moments of 2021. He also talks with Pop Warner Executive Director Jon Butler at the recent Pop Warner Super Bowl in Florida.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3EzWlQR
